sequence:
Zara Character Story - Storia di Rosa

<size=45>Chapter 1: Good Morning</size>

scripts.say: Port - Office
Ah, Commander, you're awake.
How many fingers am I holding up?
Wrong. A thumb isn't a finger. I'm afraid you're not totally awake yet.
I sent you to bed last night and yet I found you passed out on your desk this morning. Were you working all night, Commander?
You can't be pulling all nighters like that.
I was getting lectured by Zara, my secretary ship.
All because I stayed up to get some work done ahead of schedule. Of course in the end I was so tired I couldn't finish it, and now I'm behind schedule...
I've told you a hundred times. I'm your secretary ship, you have to let me help you. You can't be working yourself to death like this.
Could it be... Commander, do you not trust me? You'd rather collapse from exhaustion in the dead of night? If that's really how it is...
Then I've been derelict in my duties. And I apologize profusely.
Zara suddenly flipped around to blaming herself.
But I was never one to let others take responsibility for my failings.

options.content: "We'll cross that bridge when we come to it..."

scripts.say: Really? So you'll listen to me from now on?
Hrm... that's too bad.
Then I'm off. I certainly hope to find a strong and healthy Commander when I return.
It was a close call. If I had just given in to her, who knows what would have happened...
But I couldn't spend the whole day splayed out on my desk. I had to clean myself up.
When I started to move, I felt something had been draped over my back. It was... Zara's cape?
I would have to thank her when she got back.
